'''Yata Kouki''' {{Lang|ja=矢田幸喜}} is an [[NPC]] located in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]]. He can be found at the [[Tenryou Commission]] headquarters.

===Appearance===
Yata Kouki wears a standard uniform modeled from the {{Lang|''ashigaru''|ja=足軽}} of feudal Japan. He wears a purple-gray ''shitagi'', lavender ''kobakama'', white socks, and ''waraji'' sandals. His eggplant-colored armor with pale gold accents consists of ''dou'' (breastplate) with the [[Inazuma Shogunate]]'s crest, ''kote'' (armored sleeves), ''haidate'' (thigh guards), and ''sune-ate'' (greaves). He is also wearing a {{Lang|''jingasa''|ja=陣笠}} with the crest of the Inazuma Shogunate. He is equipped with a ''juumonji yari'' (cross-shaped spear), whose shaft is lavender colored, and contains the Shogunate crest under the spearhead.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Hello! Glory to the Shogun and her everlasting...
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Wait, who are you? What is your business here?
:{{DIcon}} I'm just passing through.
::'''Yata Kouki:''' Really?
::'''Yata Kouki:''' Hmm... You weren't doing anything suspicious earlier, that's for sure. You may pass.
::'''Yata Kouki:''' The exit's that way, so don't wander around. The headquarters of the [[Tenryou Commission]] can be a confusing place, and you don't want to get "lost."
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Yata Kouki:''' I'm warning you. Don't you get any wicked ideas!
{{Dialogue end}}
